erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$block: This class represents a contact in ContactController. Used by getting data.

$ul: **active**: The top part > Active > A check box that indicates (if selected) that the contact is active.
**address**: The Details tab > Address section >
**addressId**
**addressLine1**: Address 1 > The first line of the customer's/supplier's/company's/employee's contact address.
**addressLine2**: Address 2 > The second line of the address.
**addressLine3**: Address 3 > The third line of the address.
**city**: City > The city.
**country**: Country > The country.
**errorInfo**
**id**: Mandatory field: Country ID* > The unique two-letter country ID according to international standard ISO 3166.
**metadata**
**maxPageSize**
**totalCount**
**name**: Mandatory field: Country name* > The complete name of the country.
**county**: County > The county or province.
**id**: Click the magnifier > The identifier
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name
**postalCode**: Postcode > The postcode.
**businessAccount**: The top part > Business account > The business account associated with the contact.
**businessAccountType**: The top part > Business account > The business account type of the business account associated with the contact.
**contactId**: The top part > Contact ID > The unique identifier of the contact, which the system generates automatically.
**contactMethod**: CRM section not available in Visma.net ERP
**displayName**
**doNotCall**: CRM section not available in Visma.net ERP
**doNotEmail**: CRM section not available in Visma.net ERP
**doNotFax**: CRM section not available in Visma.net ERP
**doNotMail**: CRM section not available in Visma.net ERP
**email**: The Details tab > Contact section > Email > The email address of the contact.
**fax**: The Details tab > Contact section > Business fax > The fax number of the contact.
**firstName**: The top part > First name > The first name of the contact.
**lastModifiedDateTime**: Background information: The date and time when the details of the contact were last updated.
**lastName**: Mandatory field: The top part > Last name* > The last name of the contact.
**noMarketing**: CRM section not available in Visma.net ERP
**noMassMail**: CRM section not available in Visma.net ERP

**phone1**: The Details tab > Contact section > Business 1/Business 2/Business 3/Business assistant 1/Business fax /Home/Home fax/Mobile > The primary phone number of the contact. Select the type from the drop down.

**phone2**: The Details tab > Contact section > Business 1/Business 2/Business 3/Business assistant 1/Business fax /Home/Home fax/Mobile > The primary phone number of the contact. Select the type from the drop down.

**phone3**: The Details tab > Contact section > Business 1/Business 2/Business 3/Business assistant 1/Business fax /Home/Home fax/Mobile > The primary phone number of the contact. Select the type from the drop down.
**position**: The top part > Job title > The contactâ€™s job title or position.
**sameAsAccount**: The Details tab > Same as in account > A check box that indicates (if selected) that the contact's address is the same as the address of the business account.
**title**: The top part > First name > The contact's courtesy title.
**web**: The Details tab > Contact section > Web > The website of the contact, if any.
**stateLocation**
